Detailed Description

Abstract base class for all items which can be embedded into an Editor-Document. Every Abstract-Editor-Item has a unique ID.

Currently used IDs (the IDs from 0 to 999 are reserved for APOXI):

  • 0 ... AtomItem
  • 1 ... CompoundItem
  • 2 ... CharItem
  • 3 ... BoundedItem
  • 4 ... ImageItem
  • 5 ... SoundItem
  • 6 ... TextCompoundItem
  • 7 ... TimeCompoundItem
  • 8 ... DateCompoundItem
  • 9 ... IpAddrCompoundItem
  • 10 ... RichTextCompoundItem
  • 11 ... ParagraphCompoundItem
  • 12 ... GeneralCompoundItem
  • 13 ... ParagraphMarker
  • 14 ... VCardItem
  • 15 ... AudioItem

virtual BOOLEAN AbstractEditorItem::IsInstanceOf (  INT  id  )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns:
